title: Sun Transit in the 7th House for Virgo Ascendant
summary: When the Sun transits your 7th house, relationships, partnerships, and public dealings come into sharp focus. This phase highlights how you assert authority and identity through one-to-one interactions. Business partnerships, marriage dynamics, and client relationships may demand clarity and balance. Ego clashes can arise if mutual respect is missing. At the same time, this transit supports visibility, leadership, and decision-making in collaborations—provided you avoid dominance and prioritize fairness in commitments.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Strong desire to be acknowledged by others
Need to balance self and others

closing: This Sun transit tests how well you balance authority and cooperation. Mutual respect and clarity are key to gaining strength through partnerships.
